message.body: Saw Max recently struggling with finding the secret in this stage, did you manage to find any clues?
Cause now i'm also curious what could it be lol
True, it looks just like a weird font to me tbh
You never know until you find out
There's something weird on this screen apart from the torch but not sure if i should point that out
I don't know the origins of that secret so i'm probly 99% wrong anyways
Yeah that's what the puzzles are for
nah you got this, I believe
i am spooped to heck because of you guys but otherwise ok how about yourself
its been quite hot this week, not too good here..
it kinda is your fault cuz canus also gifted me the game LUL
no one warned me the dude would comeafter me
yeah its meant to get back up into the 20s or so next week which is so wild given how its been recently
cookieyazmin might have had a worthwhile hint or two
20 is ok, 30 for like 2 months isnt
its been like 40 here cuz of a heat wave
which isn't exactly crazy for brazil, but its supposed to still be winter
perhaps, you're just not thinking enough
since it cooled down its super cozy to cuddle and snuggle and have long pjs again nkoComfy
its too much for me too bro, ive passed out multiple times just from heat alone
gotta start writing down everything you've tried for future reference
my evening got better when i found a video of a black cat on black background eating something
and you just see the lil eyes and mouth
the miles edgeworth games are out moleYo
finish ys ix so you can play ys x in october
time spent playing other games is time that could've been spent solving more 2.5 secrets...
is what i would say if my name was Kale
im scared to go back to lorelei nkoD
maybe all u need is a push in the right direction, but u never know
there's some pretty rough stuff in this
hes even more scared than i am!
didn't he also get scared by the one in the farewell medley
i described to him the dude and hes like "yeah fuck that i am not playing that"
it spooks me everytime the screen glitches ngl
im tempted to reload my save before the room lol
reminds me of the Alan Wake 2 jumpscares that got me every time
despite always being the same thing
the dog barking also gets me everytime
yeah might be rough to do one of those lmao
la-mulana would destroy you harder than these secrets
La mulana 2 took me like 72 hours lol
Putting corner just for ppl check there for secret is cruel
cant redeem ms paint drawings anymore
You're getting one for free right now.
Man I DO NOT understand people that have the patience to look for secrets in fangames. LUL
we talking about the same zwanzig?
I would rather grind an avoidance for 50 hours than facecheck every wall in one room. LUL
I mean something like that almost certainly HAS happened at some point.
the secrets in this game are certainly more elaborate
The closest thing that immediately comes to mind is the famous Zwanzig Skip in classic speedgame "Dexter's Laboratory: Mandark's Lab?"
all the ones youve found have a specific process u need to go through first and then actually get to the guest stage
Me and people did a blind race of that game, and apparently you didn't actually need to do all the stages to beat the game. OpieOP
So I just accidentally skipped the longest one and won.
And it turned out that the couple people on the leaderboard for it didn't do that, so a bunch of world records from the people I did the race with ensued. LUL
But nah, generally I am extremely unobservant, and also hate not knowing where to go in a game.
I usually actively encourage backseating when I stream fangames.
the album club roll is in btw, wolfi
i have not played it or seen things
isn't saying that its fine to read that a spoiler of its own too
yeah id rather just delete if it is an attempt
i hope its in the weekly mix
wolfi, everything has a meaning even if it has nothing to do with a secret
kale is a genius and you must accept that
sup king, hows secret hunting been today
one look at the bottom left will answer how it's been, nader
oh my god i didnt see that LMAO
song that always brings the feels... holy
wow it isnt even memorable enough for you to remember playing it
guess the game didnt do enough new stuff for you
if its any consolation i am the same degree of stuck in lorelei
im back, did you find the secret yet
say it is not the way it currently is...
i have double checked everything any idk... i just cant move forward :/
tell me u werent inspired by the mercy players in gzas stream yesterday
her ult is just fly mode with more healing and damage
anuj really dropped the ball by not hiding a secret there
I just felt like it needed to be said
maybe you can solve this if you call it a flashlight instead of a torch
man you are still going strong on those secrets :O
a CN2.5 "remake" where people used the same screens but invented new secrets would be really funny
is there anything here or just trying some stuff just in case?
when people said they were wondering what cn2.5 would do to impact the community, I immediately said complex secret hunting
uber and kale have secretfied everything
I know derf mentioned getting a lot of secret ideas from this game and thats a scary thing to hear
now I have to do a secret to start my car in the morning
good find about that upside down torch, didn't even notice that
and what are you trying now?
so you are trying to get to the blue arrow back to the red to have your double jump back?
wow dont call the kid short
@skulldude_ can you confirm that every skull has the same expression
do you know how many secrets are in the game at least? Or is that even not mentionned in the game
so you've given me the rundown of things you've tried, but what about the thinking?
I made a mock-up image when like only 5 secrets had been found to determine how many stages there were lol
think about what you have yet to try
when you have eliminated the possible, all thats left is suffering and disappointment
open back headphones are a game changer
yeah you can hear a lot
I used to always stream with only 1 earcup on so that I could hear myself and the world around me, but now I understand the joys of open back
I've had open back sennheisers since 2016
sennheiser initially went out of business because their products were too good so people didnt need to keep buying new ones
yeah I've had the same pair, just have to replace the ear pads every couple years
you also eventually get used to the sound of other  headphones
it sounds like youre gonna flip
i love having the sennheiser hd 598s because i can say i havethe same headphones as markiplier
you have been close with at least 1 of your 700 ideas
kalTom ......    kalBozo   ........     kalWolfie ...... The dissolution of man
which one is wolfi right now
if you dont, you ban nader
ill instill all my faith in wolfi
one attempt for the good boys
there's a starman waiting for you
i'm glad you're doing these on stream wolfi
who knows maybe i go rogue one day
and it could be an easy one tap
disheartening is a very fitting word
maybe a viscous game could fasten the brain bolts
bro did not pick the right row or column
yea that one, I played it, one of my favorites
I feel like over half the games on this list are brain games
its time for no one lives under the lighthouse
I think the chained together runs will pop off once the blunder counter is implemented
oh yeah another horror game from your wishlist came out yesterday https://store.steampowered.com/app/2123640/Hollowbody/
it is definitely one of the wishlisted games
ive got like 100 wishlited games and even that feels like way too much for me
i have to cull it occasionally
sometimes you find the real gems
the whole country forms a pentagram......
this is probably one of the "easier" ones for people
the viewers will always notice tiling errors before the actual streamer
it was probably just less time spent in the brown stage
is that a the witness noise
Hi Wolfie, any solved mysteries today?
It's alright, even Sherlock chased red herrings from time to time
don't remember the last time it was that I heard a dangan song
i have reached the full depths of despair
I really feel like im stumbling at the last hurdle
you're the one shafting them rn...
think outside of the box tralex3Sup
its not wide putin hours yet, ur fine
wolfi is definitely putin in the hours
a period of time where wolfi would laugh at wide putin incessantly while exhausted in his chair trying his hardest not to sleep in vc
you just won the 50/50 for feixiao
He really took the double L
perhaps you could solve this with a genki edit
or maybe not secret, but it was a screen from it
define a goal, explain your process
think of all the tools you have at your disposal to get you to your goal
what would van arkride do in this situation
Did you find any clues in other rooms?
There's no shame in asking for clues if you're not having fun
I'm sure you'll figure them out eventually :)
yeah we got m2s this week
tyty. y'all get zurai back yet?
I might have to try pf reclears next week. I kinda lost hope this week after last week
he offered help to me before, I am just hestiant to ask as always lol
I didnt get any group that could get to mouser 2 last time
Are you off the deadlock hype train yet Wolfie?
I got my heavensward relic done yesterday tho
same, currently doing a Super Metroid playthrough from time to time on my bed at night
Nah dropped it to get some productivity time back
my next grind might be the eureka tank armour... a soul crushing journey perhaps but it looks awesome
damn, I loved eureka, got the relic as i went
i cant wait for the new zone, I hope its more like eureka than bozja but both are good
i didnt even unlock the island
I feel like cosmic exploration is the next expansion on island sanctuary
but i may be wrong on that
that kinda feels covered by the submarine stuff
space is just the dry ocean
well they announced a "cosmic exploration" content
we just dont know what it is
oh they actually did? that's nifty
just that its for small parties
I want to expand what im playing, but I dont really know what to
honestly I really surprised myself, especially with some chunks with back to back instant solves
I love the lil marimba-like gal in the background here
oh wow i forgot u had a stage in that
well it was the only part of that game i was interested in playing
I had a stage that I later released as a standalone game
dr1 really had an incredible atmosphere
dr2 was one of the games of all time for me
yeah the games draw you in super easily
I take issue with the writing in hindsight but man, those were the days
its a shame the non mainline stuff looks so knock off tier. like the psp game.
they're compelling in spite of everything
yea theyre making dr but not dr
looks like the main guy behind zero escape was also involved there?
I'm back from a shower, did I miss anything?
yeah ztd tried to close the open questions left behind by vlr and only opened further questions in the process lol
yea honestly even after vlr it was like naaaah what else could be done
i remember playing 999 being like "dude the 9 is busted there's no way this is so scuffed" and then they not only acknowledge it but make it central to the story
The m night shyamalan of video games
but I do like vlr's soundtrack more
I was always super into the experimental techno Hosoe did for the puzzles
highly recommend this to fans of zero escape/danganronpa/ace attorney (the site's being slow for me rn though) https://aaonline.fr/forum/viewtopic.php?t=13387
using a puzzle game ost to power your brain
maybe it's about time I properly played 999/vlr...
so like, I've only ever watched people do 999/vlr, I played ztd blind and afterwards bought the bundle with the first two but never actually went into them
wanted to wait a good while to kinda "forget" a lot of the games
unfort I only remember the big twists but have basically no memory of the puzzles themselves
I hope you get back to it one day <3 adore that game
yeah I was interested that until I saw it was still in EA lol
i took a break for the night
